segments.text: I can't believe how calm the woman is while drying those dishes, completely ignoring the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing everywhere, and she doesn't even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy on that wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar, and it looks really dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should really turn off the faucet and pay attention to what's happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting slippery, and someone could really get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why the drain isn't working properly, causing this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos in here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I need to do something to prevent an accident from happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation is really making me anxious, seeing all these potential hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR
